00025 #include <Entree_complete.h>
00026 #include <Process.h>
00027 #include <communications.h>
00028 #include <communications_array.h>
00029 #include <Nom.h>
00030 
00031 Entree_complete::Entree_complete(const char* str_entree1, Entree& entree2)
00032 {
00033   num_entree_ = 0;
00034   str_size_ = strlen(str_entree1);
00035   chaine_str_.init(str_entree1);
00036   Process::Journal() << "Construction of a Entree_complete with : " << str_entree1 << finl;
00037   entree2_ = &entree2;
00038   num_entree_ = 0;
00039   Error_Action action = entree2.get_error_action();
00040   Entree::set_error_action(action);
00041   chaine_str_.set_error_action(action);
00042   int check_types_sa = entree2.check_types();
00043   Entree::set_check_types(check_types_sa);
00044   chaine_str_.set_check_types(check_types_sa);
00045 }
00046 
00047 Entree_complete::~Entree_complete()
00048 {
00049   entree2_ = 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 Entree& Entree_complete::get_input()
00053 {
00054   if (num_entree_ == 0)
00055     {
00056       int pos = chaine_str_.get_istream().tellg();
00057       if (pos < str_size_ && pos >= 0)
00058         return chaine_str_;
00059       num_entree_ = 1;
00060     }
00061   return *entree2_;
00062 }
00063 
00064 int Entree_complete::get(char* ob, int bufsize)
00065 {
00066   Entree& is = get_input();
00067   return is.get(ob, bufsize);
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 Entree& Entree_complete::operator>>(int& ob)
00072 {
00073   Entree& is = get_input();
00074   is >> ob;
00075   return *this;
00076 }
00077 
00078 int Entree_complete::get(int * ob, int n)
00079 {
00080 // Je fais une boucle pour permettre au tableau de valeurs d'etre
00081 // a cheval sur les deux entrees:
00082   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00083     {
00084       Entree& is = get_input();
00085       if (! is.get(ob+i, 1))
00086         return 0;
00087     }
00088   return 1;
00089 }
00090 #ifndef INT_is_64_
00091 Entree& Entree_complete::operator>>(long& ob)
00092 {
00093   Entree& is = get_input();
00094   is >> ob;
00095   return *this;
00096 }

00150 int Entree_complete::eof()
00151 {
00152   Entree& is = get_input();
00153   return is.eof();
00154 }

00168 //! Il est interdit de changer de type d'entree. exit()
00169 int Entree_complete::set_bin(int bin)
00170 {
00171   if (bin)
00172     {
00173       Cerr << "Error in Entree_complete::set_bin(int bin) : not supported" << finl;
00174       Process::exit();
00175     }
00176   return bin;
00177 }

00179 //
00180 //
00181 //! affecte le drapeau aux deux entrees sources<br>Attention, le drapeau de entree2 est modifie !<br>Voir Entree::set_check_types()
00182 void Entree_complete::set_check_types(int flag)
00183 {
00184   Entree::set_check_types(flag);
00185   chaine_str_.set_check_types(flag);
00186   entree2_->set_check_types(flag);
00187 }
00188 
00189 //
00190 //
00191 //! affecte la valeur aux deux entrees sources<br>Attention, la valeur de entree2 est modifiee !<br>Voir Entree::set_error_action()
00192 void Entree_complete::set_error_action(Error_Action action)
00193 {
00194   Entree::set_error_action(action);
00195   chaine_str_.set_error_action(action);
00196   entree2_->set_error_action(action);
00197 }
